Class IR_sys

  • java.lang.Object
    • IR_sys
  • public class IR_sys
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for IR vote, stores all required information of IR vote. And perform the vote counting.

    It first create IR_Ballot objects for each ballot. Allocate the ballot to candidates and check the majority. Discard the candidate with least votes and redistribute the ballot. It stops when someone reach the majority. If only two candidates remain, the popularity wins.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jicheng Zhu

      • IR_sys

        public IR_sys​(java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> candidate,
              java.util.ArrayList<Party> party,
              int number_candidate,
              int num_seats,
              int total_ballot,
              java.util.Scanner scanner,
              java.io.PrintWriter mywriter)
        Constructor, creates new IR_sys instance.
        Parameters:
        candidate - Candidate ArrayList, which contains all candidates to join the IR vote.
        party - Party ArrayList which contains all parties that have joined the IR vote.
        number_candidate - total number of all candidates participating in the IR election.
        num_seats - total number of winning seats in the IR election.
        total_ballot - total number of ballot in the IR election.
        scanner - java scanner type used to help reading the input CSV file.
